creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: very short with short sleeves; red panels under arms; red and white woven panels at center chest and sides; breasts and sleeves are black with embroidered circles in cream and yellow (gangha-jumna pattern relating to "gold" and "silver" imagery of the two rivers)
dimension: 11 1/2 x 32 13/16 in. (29.21 x 83.34 cm) (neck to back hem and sleeve to sleeve, unfolded, without ties)
title: Parsi Blouse
